overview:
From 1995, year zero of internet in Italy, helped managers and entrepreneurs in building up from the scratch many successful web portals, startups, founding associations and launching important initiatives nationwide and abroad also.

A talented PR and OnLine Media Specialist, Carmelo has been actively involved in the field of Public Relations and Communications for Startups.

During his early PR career, starting on the year zero of internet, he tested his capacities in mixing offline communication techniques with online publishing, marketing and press.

As a resourceful and energetic leader adept at implementing high-profile, image-based public relations, corporate communications and marketing programs, Carmelo is an expert at creating integrated strategies to develop new/existing brand/product evolution, and media endorsement.

Carmelo’s professional experience over the last 14+ years highlights his proven abilities in effective time, project, budget and staff management.

This is only a portion of the goals he has achieved in his career. He is well acquainted with and esteemed by many ICT Pros, CEOs and journalists, who acknowledge him as a capable and courteous project manager with the skills of a talented manager.
